row.process:
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
! In case of path to file or folder as C: escape by apppend \\ at the end ! In case of the last characters is \, it will be apppend \ for each. eg : C:\ will be C:\\, C:\\ will be C:\\\\ :IF &END_CHAR# = ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\\") :ELSE : WHILE &END_CHAR# = "\" : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\") : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : IF &LENGTH# = 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = "" : ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDWHILE :ENDIF
